title: 2015 Predictions: Calibration Results
summary:
Key ideas
- The author (Scott) is reviewing his predictions for 2015 and grading their accuracy
- The predictions include a mix of world events and personal life occurrences
- The author graded himself based on how confident he was in each prediction and the outcome

Key learnings
- The author's predictions had an overall success rate of 63%
- The author had higher success rates for predictions he was more confident in
- Scott Adams had a very successful year of predictions, with 9/9 correct

Key questions
- How do the author's predictions for 2016 compare to those from 2015?
- Can predictions be improved with better data and analysis?
- What can we learn from high-performing predictors like Scott Adams?
